text: The 1968 Volta a Catalunya was the 48th edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 8 September to 15 September 1968. The race started in Tona and finished in Barcelona. The race was won by Eddy Merckx. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 33" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 51" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 4' 19" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 6' 07" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 6' 16" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 6' 31" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 6' 54" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 7' 29" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 7' 30" |} |} ==References== 1968 Volta Category:1968 in Spanish road cycling
